entry.title: Let's Bring SQL into the 21st Century
entry.summary: SQL is the most popular query language for data but it's almost 50 years old and showing its age. We propose adding a couple of features to SQL to make it a better language for building data services.
entry.content:
SQL is the most popular query language for data but it's almost 50 years old and showing its age. We propose adding a couple of features to SQL to make it a better language for building data services.

Structured Query Language (SQL) was designed in the early 70s

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Docusaurus blogging features are powered by the blog plugin.
entry.content:
Docusaurus blogging features are powered by the blog plugin.

Simply add Markdown files (or folders) to the blog directory.

Regular blog authors can be added to authors.yml.

The blog post date can be extracted from filenames, such as:

  • 2019-05-30-welcome.md
  • 2019-05-30-welcome/index.md

A blog post folder can be convenient to co-locate blog post images:

The blog supports tags as well!

And if you don't want a blog: just delete this directory, and use blog: false in your Docusaurus config.
